comments:
I could not login to bugzilla using mylyn, please suggest the solutions to me. Thanks alot.

I setup the bugzilla 2.22 using the bugzilla-2.22.1-2.deb package, this package had change structure, so It's cause that error. So, I thinks, it is not a bug. 
In this case, I think the mylyn will be alarm the user about this problem.
This is not a bug. The bugzilla 2.22.2 code supported in Ubuntu 7.04 was changed, so the connector could not detect and login to bugzilla well.
